content:
[Pennsylvania Senate 2022 | Philadelphia Suburbs (Montgomery County - King of Prussia) | P1: F, 47, Pharmaceutical executive, Villanova, MBA, Romney-Clinton-Biden voter, two teenagers]
Q: Let me read you a potential contrast message: "Tony Marchetti grew up in Scranton, son of a steelworker. He paid his way through college, served his community as mayor, and fights for working families every day. David Thornton made billions on Wall Street, moved to Pennsylvania ten years ago, and now wants to buy a Senate seat. Pennsylvania deserves a senator who understands our struggles, not a billionaire who's never had one."
"That's devastatingly effective. It's all true and it draws the contrast perfectly."
